name: Pots and Potions
description:
Pots & Potions is a competitive local multiplayer mayhem about crafting the craziest, most impossible potions in an ever-changing alchemy lab where the environment itself conspires against you.

Both the potions themselves, as well as the ingredients and pots you use will leave the laboratory in a complete mess and will make it very difficult for you to be the first. Alchemy has never been this crazy!
